Author: DCC_Official
Title: [ANN] Distributed Credit Chain [DCC]
Body: We've built a new master page! For latest updates, please go to  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3209215   March 28th, Weekly update:     1. Highlight of the week: DCC was featured on the front-page of Cointime, an influential, Blockchain-focused media outlet in China, and was called "The upgraded version of Ripple" for its distributed banking ecosystem. According to the article, the promising idea of a distributed banking system is a crucial step to "New Finance".    2. Technology Development: The first Dapp is officially launched. Limited access has been granted to users. With DCC Explorer, users' behaviors on the chain can be reviewed.     USDT Loaning App    The Dapp is being rapidly developed, and the progress will be updated on Github starting this week.     New Installment payment Dapp for mobile phone purchase    Dapp is being jointly developed, and users will be able to review and maintain personal credit information and purchase mobile phones with installment payment on DCC.     Open Platform    Development is ongoing.        3. Project Progress    At an academic conference held in Guanghua School of Management, Peking University, DCC team discussed with professors about ways to combine blockchain technology and financing in the most practical and efficient manner. The two parties planned to establish a research group to facilitate the development of distributed banking ecosystem.        4. Community News    We launched on WeChat a red package mini game to reward the global community. In this game, participants earn rewards by collecting DCC Candies. During this process, community members get to know more about the project and enjoy the benefits of promotional events at the same time. The mini game and related posters have reached more than 10,000 people in WeChat groups and Moments.        Dr. Stewie Zhu, founder and CEO of DCC, visited Israel to discuss the advanced development of blockchain technology and shared the experience of the DCC project.        DCC global community:    Telegram Group 1: https://t.me/DccOfficial    Telegram Group 2: https://t.me/dcc_official2    Twitter: https://twitter.com/DccOfficial2018    Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/DCC_Official/    Medium: https://medium.com/@dcc.finance2018    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DccOfficial2018/    YouTube:    https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0Y5MQwTLGPtIP1jAJm9Ng    Bitcointalk:    https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3206007.msg33290945#msg33290945     March 20th, Project Update:  During the past week, our tech team continued to drive multiple work streams forward and made impressive achievements on all fronts.    1. DCC Explorer: We have successfully completed the optimization of the data display with remarkable enhancement in the data processing efficiency.    2. First Dapp on Distributed Credit Chain Launched! Thanks to our privileged partner, the very first Dapp in the DCC ecosystem allows credit check, borrowing and lending processes to be recorded on the chain, while all activities can be located on the DCC Explorer. The team is also finanlizing a demo video to provide DCC's global community first-hand experience of the significant progress that we are creating.    3. USDT Dapp: the ongoing develoment of the second Dapp of our platform is progressing well and smoothly. We are also in touch with a well-known exchange for potential business cooperation through the Dapp.    4. DCC Open Platform: Development is well underway! Thank you all for your continued support. We look forward to bringing more updates to the community!      March 13th, Project Update:     1. We are excited to officially launch our Explorer! Users can check the blocks and transactions on the DCC now through: http://explorer.dcc.finance    2. Dapp Launch Count Down! Our first loan Dapp is undergoing internal testing and production testing is planned on March 14. Stay tuned!    3. The R&D progress o the USDT-loan-Dapp is going smoothly. Currently, USDT has 2 pools: OMNI and ETHEREUM - we welcome digital asset holders to discuss in our group and help us make a choice. Thoughts?    4. We have completed the design of the open platform and moved forward with the R&D stage.      March 6th, Project Update:     1. The explorer is under development and will launch on March 12th. The database of the data-on-chain has been completed.    2. Dapp progress update: data verification and API of loan have been completed; post-loan management is under development; the development of user data cloud storage has been completed by 80%. The design of USDT-loan-Dapp is completed and is on R&D stage.     February 27th, Project Update:     1. The coalition-chain-based blockchain explorer is under development. The method of node status display, block height and time to reach consensus have been packaged.    2. The open platform is under development. Development of the Dapp is progressing well. When the Dapp is released on March 15th, the new test contract will be deployed to optimized users' credit history index storage performance on the chain.      February 19th, Project Update:     1. The pbft-based coalition chain has been completed. The coalition-chain-based blockchain explorer is under development and is expected to be released in the first week of March.    2. Smart contracts that are based on users' authentication worldwide, operator data validation contracts and smart contracts for bank data have been developed and deployed on DCC. Thanks to all the participants.    3. Peer to peer IOU contract has been completed and is deployed on DCC. IOU contract data standards will be released with the explorer.    4. Based on the current progress, the first DCC-based Dapp is set to be released on March 15th.

Author: joey alexander
Title: [ANN] Distributed Credit Chain [DCC]
Body: Solving the financial problems under consideration will become a contributing factor to facilitating business relations all over the world, leading to a disruption of the monopoly of financial institutions and making a huge step towards decentralization and openness of the ecosystem in the era of blockchain. Thanks to the new Dcc standards, the level of efficiency of the traditional system of banks will be increased, which will avoid additional costs is a good idea.good luck team
